comment.author: 66774849@N04
comment._content: I wonder if the photo was taken while Belgica was caught in the ice. I read on Wikipedia they were blocked for one year and they had to carve a waterway for the ship through thick layer of ice of 6 meter for a distance of 75 meters. Impressive !!

comment.author: 48220291@N04
comment._content: Yes, this picture was most likely taken while they were caught in the ice. If you look at the other pictures in the "Belgica"-set, you will see their attempt to carve their way out of the ice.

comment.author: 66774849@N04
comment._content: I did check the set www.flickr.com/photos/national_library_of_norway/sets/721... Thank you for your reply :)
